snippet: Cheri Young said she agreed to the deception about John Edwards’s affair because she believed there was no other way to protect Mr. Edwards’s presidential bid and her husband’s career.
abstract: Cheri Young, the wife of John Edwards's former top aide Andrew Young, testifies at the former senator’s federal corruption trial that she was reluctantly drawn into an intricate web of deceit to cover up Edwards's affair and illegitimate child with Rielle Hunter.

byline.contributor: William Dupre contributed reporting from Greensboro, and Timothy Williams from New York.

lead_paragraph: Cheri Young said she agreed to the deception about John Edwards’s affair because she believed there was no other way to protect Mr. Edwards’s presidential bid and her husband’s career.
